data.title: Tom Hardy to narrate Amazon's All or Nothing: Tottenham Hotspur
data.meta_description: Actor, producer and born-and-bred Londoner, Tom Hardy, will narrate the upcoming UK Amazon Original series, All or Nothing: Tottenham Hotspur.  Hardy, born a
data.text:
Actor, producer and born-and-bred Londoner, Tom Hardy, will narrate the upcoming UK Amazon Original series, All or Nothing: Tottenham Hotspur.

Hardy, born and raised in Hammersmith, London, will guide viewers through the series which will take sports fans behind the scenes of this illustrious football club during a pivotal season and follow all of the key events, including the arrival of José Mourinho as the club’s new head coach.

The series will follow not just the brand new epic 62,000-seater stadium in North London and the club’s extensive work in helping to transform the local area, but also gain deep exclusive access to a season like no other, including the behind-the-scenes running of the Club and the response to the Premier League shutdown.

All or Nothing: Tottenham Hotspur launches exclusively on Amazon Prime Video on August 31st, with three new episodes every Monday until September 14th.
